tool_description: Just trying out making an API
name: Test Build Live
title: Test Build Live

api_list.name: Get news from specific news outlets
api_list.description: Pick out which source to retrieve news from
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://test-build-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "test-build-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://test-build-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "test-build-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
